posts.post_content:
I suppose this one goes under the "T" column, as it doesn't really fit anywhere else.  Anyway, not one you see everyday since it comes from overseas.  I'm always looking for trades, especially T202, T205, and 1952 Topps (beaters permissible).  I'll also sell if I don't get a trade, so send an offer if you want.

Take Care,
Geno
